title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2527.2 - Proceedings instituted by the DHCR
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2527.2 - Proceedings instituted by the DHCR
State Regulations

The DHCR may institute, reclassify, or convert a
proceeding on its own initiative whenever the DHCR deem sit necessary or
appropriate pursuant to the RSL or this Code. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2527.2

Amended

New

York State Register November 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 45, eff. 11/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
